Description: DJ GEAR INSTRUMENT GEAR LIVE SOUND RECORDING MICROPHONES HEADPHONES ACCESSORIES SOFTWARE LIGHTING BUNDLES Authorized Dealer EVH Wolfgang Special Electric Guitar - Stealth Black - Used 6-String Electric Guitar - Stealth Black - Used - Description A beautiful new Wolfgang Special model with an arched top basswood body, crafted in EVH's Mexico facility with a re-imagined design that delivers more guitar at greater value than ever. Features include a quartersawn maple neck with an oil finish and special Wolfgang profile, smooth and fast compound-radius maple fingerboard (12"-16") with comfortably rolled edges and 22 jumbo frets, dual EVH Wolfgang direct-mount humbucking pickups, two domed black control knobs (master volume, master tone), EVH Floyd Rose bridge and locking nut, and EVH tuners.
